GSD.description:
md/raid1: stop mdx_raid1 thread when raid1 array run failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 10d713532ffc67b13df61ed9c138a8ce0a186236. For more details please see the references link.
